short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarize the content of a webpage using ChatGPT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
chatGPT Summarizer utilizes OpenAI's API to automatically generate concise summaries of web page content with just one click.

This easy-to-use tool helps users quickly understand the main points of a web page without having to read through the entire content.
